short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes new tab window to one with environmental information and tips

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EcoAssist will modify your new tab page to give you important information about the environment and small ways to help solve the current environmental crisis.

We’re still in the beta phase so don’t be shy and reach out to us with any feedback! You can find us at eco.assist.extension@gmail.com or through the support page on our website: https://ecoassistextension.wixsite.com/launch/support
